name: Editor Land
description:
This is level editor game. I made this for (Maybe) 7 days!


CONTROLS
- A and D to move
- Space to jump
- Right click to delete block
- Left click to place block
- Middle click to select "none"

CREDITS
Art = Dafasyusia
Programmer = Dafasyusia
Music = Kevin macleod
Playtester = Pixelknife3 and ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
